performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Whilst your passion for dance in general came across, so did your lack of subject knowledge which could be applied to work in a secondary school classroom. When asked to provide examples of choreographers, or dance groups who were unable to do so. This is an extremely important aspect of dance teaching in modern secondary schools, especially at GCSE and A Level. Time spent in a dance department at a secondary school (when it is safe to do so) looking at GCSE and A Level specifications, and how experienced teachers apply this knowledge would be well spent.
